signals.problem_statement: The current email system leads to delays in response times, risking the loss of projects due to unassigned emails.
signals.customer_ask: Want to ensure there's an SLA on responses and proper workflows for email assignments.
signals.context: Agency service business with a small team handling multiple types of inquiries through a single email.

signals.problem_statement: There is no integration with the project management tool 'Bonsai', which complicates workflow.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for a way to integrate with their project management tool.
signals.context: Agency service business managing project inquiries and needing to track them in a project management system.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to track who has read notifications within the team.
signals.customer_ask: Inquiring about tracking read receipts for notifications.
signals.context: Agency service business with multiple team members needing visibility on email interactions.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires a way to automate email assignments based on content but finds the current capabilities insufficient.
signals.customer_ask: Wants to know if there's a way to auto-assign emails based on their content.
signals.context: Agency service business dealing with various inquiries that need to be routed to the right team members.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the time it takes to prepare proposals from incoming requests.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for a solution that can help streamline the proposal preparation process.
signals.context: Agency service business that receives numerous development requests requiring detailed proposals.
